content.prompt: In lines 7-8 (“<u>Comites</u> . . . <u>sinus</u>"), Proserpina tells her companions to

choices.label: take her with them when they leave
look at the meadow full of ﬂowers
smell the ﬂowers that fill the meadow

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
